tool_description: Provides Quotes Services . You can get quote with author name , type
title: GET Quote

api_list.name: GET Quote
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://get-quote1.p.rapidapi.com/api/quotes"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "get-quote1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Create Quote
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://get-quote1.p.rapidapi.com/api/quote"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "get-quote1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: API Count
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://get-quote1.p.rapidapi.com/api/quotes/count"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "get-quote1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get By Author
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://get-quote1.p.rapidapi.com/api/quote/author/{findone}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "get-quote1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get by Type

api_list.name: Create Quote
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://get-quote1.p.rapidapi.com/api/quote"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "get-quote1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://get-quote1.p.rapidapi.com/api/quote"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "get-quote1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
